mention.text: the day Of the prodigy and crime , When they killed him in his pity , When they killed him in his prime Of clemency and calm
Indicative of the passion of the people on the 15th of April , 1865 Good Friday
the people on the 15th of April , 1865 Good Friday
sobbing of the strong , And a pall upon the land
sobbing of the strong , And a pall upon the land
the People weeping When they bare the iron hand
the People weeping When they bare the iron hand
his blood -- The father in his face
The Avenger wisely stern , Who in righteousness shall do What heavens call him to , And the parricides remand ; For they killed him in his kindness
